title: Centaur
description: Fantastic creatures with the legs and body of a horse, and the upper body and head of a human. Live in small family or tribal groups, in wild meadows and isolated forests.
extras: Weapons: Bows, clubs, lances.	Lair: Hidden in dense woods, along twisting, guarded paths.	Females and young: Normally remain in the lair. Flee if attacked. Young have 2HD and make 2 hoof attacks (1d2) and 1 weapon attack (1d4 or by weapon).
